doc.title: Incommunicado
doc.plot: A survival story in the Siberian Taiga. Jordan King awakes in the forest after his plane has been shot down. Terribly injured from the crash, Jordan battles the loss of his hearing as he desperately searches for his wife. He unwillingly recruits the help of a young Evenki boy who neither understands Jordan's plight nor speaks his language. An unknown danger looms as the culprits of the plane crash search for survivors.
